name: Cannon Fist
description:
Cannon Fist is a 2D Game Developed By a Single Developer in just 2 Weeks. It is only for Entertainment and only developed for Learning Game Development.

This Game Has:-

  • Day Night Cycle
  • 4 Different Enemy With Their Own Ability
  • 3 Unique Spell
  • Upgrade Mechanism
  • 2D Cartoonish Style Game
  • Trajectory Projection
  • 100% Free With No Ads

Note :- If you found any bug or issue please contact at this email :- biswasabhijit13499@gmail.com

and if you have any inquiry please contact the email above mentioned.

Thank You,
